p: Influenza virus is a highly infectious respiratory pathogen manifesting a significant threat to global public health [ 1]. Influenza A(H1N1)pdm09 virus, which emerged in 2009 and caused a global influenza pandemic, is now a seasonal influenza virus that co-circulates with another seasonal influenza (H3N2) and influenza B viruses. Worldwide circulation of A(H1N1)pdm09 virus has raised concerns about genotypic diversity that enhances virus transmissibility and pathogenicity and affects vaccine efficacy [ 4].
